keboola_token.title: Keboola Token
keboola_token.description: Authentication token for accessing Keboola services. Keep this token secure as it grants access to your Keboola resources.

bucket_id.title: Bucket ID
bucket_id.description: Identifies a specific storage container (bucket) within keboola. Bucket_id  is  'in.c-' + bucket name

table_name.title: Table Name
table_name.description: Specifies the name of a data table within the bucket.

ns_client_key.title: Client Key
ns_client_key.description: OAuth client key used for secure authentication with NetSuite's API.

ns_client_secret.title: Client Secret
ns_client_secret.description: OAuth client secret used for secure authentication with NetSuite's API.

ns_resource_owner_key.title: Resource Owner Key
ns_resource_owner_key.description: OAuth resource owner key for secure authentication with NetSuite's API.

ns_resource_owner_secret.title: Resource Owner Secret
ns_resource_owner_secret.description: OAuth resource owner secret for secure authentication with NetSuite's API.

ns_restlet_url.title: RESTlet URL
ns_restlet_url.description: The URL of a NetSuite RESTlet, a custom script deployed on NetSuite that handles API requests.

ns_searchID.title: Search ID
ns_searchID.description: Identifier for a saved search within NetSuite.
